name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 07: Tanoshiku Manabu Unten Menkyo
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.07 - Tanoshiku Manabu Unten Menkyo is a simulation game about getting a driving license. The game is divided in 2 different parts: - The first part are different quiz that the player have to answer correctly. This part uses a 2d engine. - Different driving situations in the city in this part the gameplay is pressing the proper button or D-Pad when they are shown on the screen to pass each lesson. This part of the game uses a 3d engine.
